content.description:
WANG GUANGYI, CHINESE PAINTER, COCA-COLA, PAINTING, CIRCA 1995

Paul Strawson / Alamy

The painting shows Chinese youths dressed in the style typically depicted in communist propaganda posters, but with the Coca-Cola corporate logo in the background. The painting has been displayed in several galleries and museums in China.
content.question: The policies pursued by the Chinese government starting in the 1980s, which led to the economic situation reflected in the painting, are best seen as an example of which of the following late-twentieth-century trends?

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
